entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:32 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
